## ɵb.transform() method

Transforms 'date' string to moment and formats it

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transform(value: string | moment.Moment, format?: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | string \| moment.Moment | Value to be converted to moment |
|  format | string | Formats used for formatting moment |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
